---
title: 太阳能
---
[Solar](https://console.upstage.ai/services/embedding) 提供嵌入服务。

本示例演示了如何使用 LangChain 与 Solar Inference 进行文本嵌入交互。

```python
import os

os.environ["SOLAR_API_KEY"] = ""
```

```python
from langchain_community.embeddings import SolarEmbeddings
```

```python
embeddings = SolarEmbeddings()
```

```python
query_text = "This is a test query."
query_result = embeddings.embed_query(query_text)
```

```python
query_result
```
